Comment: >Amnisty Freelen's son, Joshua Beasley, Jr., was 11 when he first entered the juvenile system for spray painting a Paris, Texas church with other boys.  >A month after he turned 16, he was transferred to the Wayne Scott Unit adult prison.  >Six months later, in March 2023, he wrapped a sheet around his neck and died in his cell.  >"In the adult system, Josh is the youngest person to die," Freelen said.  There's already enough wrong with the prison system. Lowering the age by one year will only make it worse.
